participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Outgoing and adventurous, loves to connect with friends and enjoy life.
participant_1.background: I grew up with them, and we've been close ever since. Boating is my favorite activity. I wish I didn’t have to work. I want to change my look to reflect my new single status. I'm not worried about the weather because I'm inside, listening to music with my friends.

participant_2.name: Jack
participant_2.personality: Hardworking and passionate about his job, values relationships with pets and people.
participant_2.background: My favorite book is 'The Halloween Tree' by Ray Bradbury. I work in a coffee shop, and I can get a little stressed out with the fast pace and the need to always be on my feet. I have 2 dogs, both golden retrievers. I'm a hard worker and I always put my clients first. My dog is my best friend now that my cat passed away.

content.text: Hi how are you?
Not too bad, just got off work.
Oh nice, what do you do for work?
I work in a coffee shop.
Oh that sounds fun. Do you like it?
Sometimes, it can be a bit stressful but I like it overall.
Yeah I can imagine. I work in an office and it can be stressful at times too.
What do you do?
I'm a project manager.
Oh cool, that sounds like a challenging job.
It can be but it's also very rewarding.
What's your favorite thing about it?
I like working on different projects and seeing them through to completion.
That's awesome. Do you have any hobbies?
Yeah, I like to go boating and I love to listen to music.
Oh nice, I like to go boating too.
Cool, what's your favorite kind of music?
I like all kinds of music but my favorite is probably country.
Oh nice, I like country music too. We should go boating together sometime.
That would be fun.
